ch0317_40_pepper/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey! I was waiting for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0317_40_pepper/0101_0701_02_10:
I made a special meal just for you! Have as
much as you want!
ch0317_40_pepper/7101_0701_01_10:
I’m REALLY looking forward to partying it up
with everyone!
ch0317_40_pepper/7101_0701_02_10:
Your bud Arven will prepare you a feast!
Leave it to me!
ch0317_40_pepper/7101_0701_03_10:
I’ll make some standout dishes that’re perfect
for any special occasion!
ch0317_40_pepper/7102_0701_01_10:
I caught Scovillain during my hunt for
Herba Mystica in Paldea.
ch0317_40_pepper/7102_0701_02_10:
At the time, I didn’t realize we’d end up
sticking together for so long.
ch0317_40_pepper/7102_0701_03_10:
I’ve gotta keep upping my game...for the
sake of all the Pokémon that lend me their
strength!
ch0317_40_pepper/7103_0701_01_10:
It’s not always easy to make something both
delicious AND nutritious.
ch0317_40_pepper/7103_0701_02_10:
But figuring out how to do it—someway,
somehow—is how a cook shows their skills!
ch0317_40_pepper/7103_0701_03_10:
I’m gonna work hard to develop recipes that
make both people and Pokémon healthy
and happy!
ch0317_40_pepper/7104_0701_01_10:
This outfit is for cooks who make meals for
special occasions!
ch0317_40_pepper/7104_0701_02_10:
When I pull the apron strings tight, I can
really lock in...
ch0317_40_pepper/7104_0701_03_10:
Yeeeaaarrrghhh! Watch out, ingredients—
here I come!
ch0317_40_pepper/7105_0701_01_10:
Whenever you eat my food, I can tell you
really like it, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0317_40_pepper/7105_0701_02_10: Heh heh! I feel more confident thanks to you!
ch0317_40_pepper/7105_0701_03_10:
I wanna keep you smiling, so I’m gonna
keep upping my game!
ch0317_40_pepper/1701_0701_01_10: Here’s a present from your bud Arven!
ch0317_40_pepper/1701_0702_01_10:
Don’t worry—you don’t need to give me
anything in return!
ch0317_40_pepper/1701_0702_02_10: Just seeing you smile makes me happy!
ch0317_40_pepper/2501_0701_01_10:
For a lot of people, a special meal is
something fancy—something they don’t
usually eat.
ch0317_40_pepper/2501_0701_02_10:
For some people, though, a special meal is
one that brings back memories, even if the
meal itself is ordinary.
ch0317_40_pepper/2501_0701_03_10:
Do you have a meal like that that’s special
to you?
ch0317_40_pepper/2501_0702_01_10:
If you’ve got a meal that brings back
memories, you should tell me.
ch0317_40_pepper/2501_0702_02_10:
I wanna make something that’s special to
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]—and I
wanna eat it together on a special day!
ch0317_40_pepper/2511_0701_01_10:
I’ve been trying to think about what
“a special meal” means to me.
ch0317_40_pepper/2511_0701_02_10:
But honestly, I didn’t need to think much at
all. The answer came to me immediately.
ch0317_40_pepper/2511_0701_03_10:
Every meal I’ve ever eaten with my buds is
special!
ch0317_40_pepper/2511_0702_01_10:
Ever since I got here, I’ve been really
savoring my time eating with my buds!
ch0317_40_pepper/2511_0702_02_10:
Heh heh! That’s why making AND eating
food’s been such a blast lately!
ch0317_40_pepper/3001_0701_01_10:
It’s a bit chilly this morning... Makes me
crave something warm.
ch0317_40_pepper/3003_0701_01_10:
How about a super-spicy sandwich for
lunch? It’ll get your whole body burning!
ch0317_40_pepper/3005_0701_01_10:
We’re having a feast tonight! I’m gonna put
my heart and soul into it, so eat up!
